channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Verge’s 2026 Valentine’s Day gift guide (for her)
item.description: Valentine's Day often comes with more pressure than it needs to. At heart, though, February 14th is about showing appreciation for the people you care about in ways that feel thoughtful and sincere. And while big displays of romance can do that, it's often the quieter, more personal gestures - or a meaningful gift that […]

item.title: 60 dollars de plus : même Raspberry Pi n’échappe pas à la hausse des prix des PC
item.description: La crise de la RAM continue de faire grimper les prix et même Raspberry ne peut rien y faire. Le petit PC autrefois low-cost continue de voir son prix augmenter.

item.title: AirPods Pro 3 just plummeted to a record-low price — yes, even cheaper than $199!
item.description: Apple's AirPods Pro 3 have dropped to an all-new lowest seen price, only on Verizon – and they'll make for an amazing half-time show…

item.title: How to watch the 2026 Super Bowl: Patriots vs. Seahawks channel, start time, where to stream and more
item.description:
The New England Patriots are headed to the 2026 Super Bowl. (Lauren Leigh Bacho via Getty Images)
Lauren Leigh Bacho via Getty Images
MVP candidate Drake Maye and the New England Patriots face Sam Darnold and the Seattle Seahawks at Super Bowl LX, which will be held at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, CA this year. It's hard to believe we're less than a week away from the championship game, which will be held this Sunday, Feb. 8 with kickoff scheduled for 6:30 p.m. ET. But before we can get to all of that action, we've also got the Pro Bowl Games on Tuesday and the NFL Honors on Thu...

item.title: This Ancient River Seemed to Flow Uphill. Now We Know Why
item.description: The Green River may have had some help from a dripping crust.

item.description: The infamous Qilin group strikes again, this time targeting a major US airport.

item.description: Spoiler alert: they look pretty nice.

item.title: Disney is still 'hard at work' on creating its unified Hulu and Disney+ app, departing CEO says — and its new late 2026 release window is the perfect time for another vexing price hike
item.description: Disney's combined streaming app has a revised launch window — and the cynic in me has an idea of when it might launch.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2026: The Galaxy S26 lineup and everything else we expect
item.description: Samsung’s 2025 was filled with new foldables, an ultra-thin new form factor and the launch of Google's XR platform. After making some announcements at CES 2026, the company is expected to host its first Galaxy Unpacked of the year in February to introduce the Galaxy S26 lineup.Engadget will be covering Galaxy Unpacked live, and we'll most likely have hands-on coverage of Samsung's new smartphones soon after they're announced. While we wait for an official invite, here's everything we expect Samsung will introduce at the first Galaxy Unpacked event of 2026.What is Unpacked 2026 taking place?But...

item.description: Kickoff starts here with $449 budget picks to premium 4K laser projectors.

item.title: Blizzard's quality assurance workers finally have a union contract
item.description: Almost three years after starting the bargaining process with Microsoft, quality assurance workers at two Blizzard locations have ratified a union contract. The agreement covers 60 workers at Blizzard Albany and Blizzard Austin.The agreement includes guaranteed pay increases across the three years of the contract, assurances that workers will be given fair credits and recognition on games that ship, discrimination-free disability accommodations, restrictions on crunch (i.e. mandatory overtime) and "protection to immigrant workers from unfair discipline and loss of seniority while streamlining ...

item.title: IPVanish launches Threat Protection Pro to stop malware even when you’re not connected
item.description: IPVanish has launched a beta version of Threat Protection Pro for Windows. Powered by VIPRE antivirus tech, it scans downloads and blocks ads even when your VPN is off.

item.title: Windows 11 bug breaks the entire desktop for some users — but luckily there's a fix
item.description: Wondering why your Windows 11 desktop keeps vanishing? It's because of this nasty bug.

item.title: The pros and cons of workplace perfectionism
item.description: It may be better to strive for “excellencism”. Biographies of exceptional achievers tend to explain their success through personality traits, highlighting the “killer psychological weapons” that made them great. So, Steve Jobs’s abrasiveness is reframed as visionary perfectionism, Elon Musk’s impulsivity as bold risk-taking, and Jeff Bezos’s relentlessness as uncompromising customer obsession. The same retrospective alchemy applies to women: Oprah Winfrey’s emotional intensity becomes radical empathy and authenticity; Indra Nooyi’s discipline and conscientiousness are recast as values-driven, ...

item.title: Sorry, 8K TVs Have Flopped
item.description: Nobody wanted four times the pixels for many times the price.

item.title: ExpressVPN two-year plans are up to 81 percent off right now
item.description:
ExpressVPN is back on sale again, and its two-year plans are up to 81 percent off right now. You can get the Advanced tier for $88 for 28 months. This is marked down from the $392 that this time frame normally costs. On a per-month basis, it works out to roughly $3.14 for the promo period. We’ve consistently liked ExpressVPN because it’s fast, easy to use and widely available across a large global server network. In fact, it's our current pick for best premium VPN. One of the biggest drawbacks has always been its high cost, and this deal temporarily solves that issue.
In our review we were ...

item.title: Moltbook, l’étrange réseau social où les bots IA discutent entre eux sans les humains
item.description: Sur internet, personne ne sait que vous êtes un bot, en particulier sur Moltbook ! Ce clone de Reddit interdit en effet les humains : seuls les bots IA peuvent discuter entre eux. L'idée est certes saugrenue, mais le succès est au rendez-vous.

item.title: If I needed a portable power station for outages and camping, the Anker Solix C1000 is the one I’d buy — and it’s nearly half price at just $429
item.description: Anker Solix C1000 Gen 2 portable power station is just $429 and delivers 2,000W power, 3,000W peak, with a full recharge in under an hour.

item.title: « Indispensable pour l’achat entre particuliers » : voici l’avis sur carVertical de nos lecteurs pour acheter leur voiture d’occasion [Sponso]
item.description: Entre la peur des compteurs trafiqués et celle des accidents dissimulés, acheter un véhicule d’occasion est souvent une source de stress. Pour y remédier, nous avons confié le service de rapports d'historique carVertical à cinq de nos lecteurs.

item.title: Last Year’s Other Amazing ‘Predator’ Movie Is Finally Getting Some Love (Exclusive)
item.description: Mutant is releasing the soundtrack for 'Predator: Killer of Killers' on vinyl, with 'Badlands' on the way too.

item.title: That Soothing Sleep Noise Might Be Sabotaging Your Dreams
item.description: People subjected to pink noise may experience fewer minutes of REM sleep, a new study finds.

item.title: Markiplier’s Indie Sci-Fi Horror Movie Thrashed ‘Melania’ at the Box Office This Weekend
item.description: 'Iron Lung', independently funded by the Youtuber, narrowly lost the box office number 1 spot to 'Send Help'.

item.title: With more than 400 unique NPCs, free PS5 pirate adventure Sea of Remnants is shaping up to be one of the most ambitious games ever made — I’ve already played 10 hours, and I can’t get enough
item.description: I go hands-on with the upcoming free-to-play pirate RPG Sea of Remnants, diving deep into the vast ocean of content it offers.

item.title: Ce VTT électrique taillé pour les randonnées perd 300 € chez Intersport, une affaire à ne pas rater
item.description: Alors que les soldes 2026 touchent à leur fin, on trouve de très bonnes références en promotion côté vélo électrique. Parmi eux, on compte le Nakamura E-Summit 740 Open, un VTT confortable, puissant et endurant qui passe de 1 599 euros à 1 299 euros.

item.title: Sony’s last-gen, but still great 1000XM5 are cheaper than ever
item.description: It’s rare for Sony’s flagship headphones, even slightly outdated models, to receive a big discount. However, the WH-1000XM5 in black or silver is selling at its lowest-ever price today at Adorama when you enter the code JHCE9834 at checkout (it’s the last step before placing the order). Originally $399, they’re $204.56 — practically half price. According to historic pricing data from […]...

item.title: More Nothing headphones are on the way, and this leak says they'll be more budget focused — and I hope they copy one particular trait of other budget headphones
item.description: Nothing's next headphones are set to be budget spins on the Headphone (1), and we've got early release window and pricing leaks.

item.title: Strava fait le ménage : des millions d’activités supprimées pour triche au vélo électrique
item.description: Strava a indiqué avoir supprimé 3,9 millions d'activités de cyclisme supplémentaires, suspectées d'avoir été réalisées en vélo à assistance électrique dans le but de modifier les classements de segment.

item.title: GOP fundraising data reveals a ‘war chest’ for Republicans ahead of the 2026 midterms
item.description: 2025 year-end filings with the Federal Election Commission reveal that Republicans are ahead of Democrats in fundraising. The Republican National Committee has vastly outpaced Democrats in the crush for cash ahead of the midterm elections, holding a nearly $100 million advantage at the close of 2025, according to year-end filings to the Federal Election Commission.As Democrats have struggled in the Trump era, the RNC tallied $172 million raised in 2025, with $95 million cash on hand at year’s end. In contrast, the Democratic National Committee posted $145 million for the year, with $14 million...

item.title: Windows : Microsoft enterre un protocole de sécurité créé en 1993
item.description: Microsoft enterre enfin NTLM, un vieux protocole d’authentification Windows né en 1993. Devenu une porte d’entrée privilégiée pour le vol d’identifiants, le protocole a été massivement exploité par des pirates. Pour améliorer la sécurité de l'OS, l’éditeur va désactiver NTLM par défaut dans les futures versions de Windows, au profit de solutions plus modernes, comme Kerberos....

item.title: OpenClaw: all the news about the trending AI agent
item.description: An open-source AI agent called OpenClaw (formerly known as both Clawdbot and Moltbot) that runs on your own computer and “actually does things” is taking off inside tech circles. Users interact with OpenClaw via messaging apps like WhatsApp, Telegram, Signal, Discord, and iMessage, giving it the keys to operate independently, managing reminders, writing emails, or […]...

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 TV deals: The best sales this week on OLEDs and other smart TVs ahead of kickoff
item.description: The big game is one of the few instances now in the US where most people gather around the TV to watch the live event together. While the teams playing in Super Bowl 2026 are the true stars of the show (and Bad Bunny, of course), your TV is a pretty important part of the puzzle of putting together an excellent Super Bowl party. Maybe you’ve been thinking about replacing an aging set, or you’re itching for a full refresh of your home theater setup — either way, you’ll want to try to get a good deal on a new TV. Thankfully, the weeks leading up to the Super Bowl can be a great time to shop for a...

item.title: La dernière mise à jour de Windows 11 renforce discrètement la sécurité du système
item.description: Microsoft a modifié les notes de mise à jour concernant la dernière déployée sur Windows 11. Elle ajoute une couche de sécurité supplémentaire pour protéger les fichiers système.

item.title: Windows 11 : la grosse mise à jour de février est imminente, voici les principaux changements
item.description: Microsoft a prévu une nouvelle mise à jour remplie de nouvelles fonctionnalités et correctifs en février. On vous détaille les principales nouveautés de ce prochain Patch Tuesday.

item.title: Ring brings its ‘Search Party’ feature for finding lost dogs to non-Ring camera owners
item.description: Ring's Search Party feature for finding lost dogs is now available across the U.S. — even if you don't own a Ring camera.

item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, Xiaomi réussit pour l'une des premières fois de cet exercice a supplanter la toute puissance de Samsung.

item.title: How to build a culture of innovation
item.description: Hint: It takes more than just recruiting the brightest in tech. Every company wants to be innovative. Most approach this by trying to hire highly creative specialists or by spinning up a new “innovation” team. But companies that consistently innovate do something different: They build company-wide systems focused on customer solutions and make innovation part of everyday business....

item.title: Snag the 11-inch Apple iPad for under $300 at Amazon
item.description: As of Feb. 2, the 11-inch Apple iPad (A16) is $299.99 at Amazon, down from $349. That's a 14% discount or $49.01 in savings.

item.title: Bientôt adieu Visa et Mastercard : la solution européenne de paiement arrive
item.description: L'EPI et Alliance EuroPA signent un accord majeur pour l'avenir du paiement en Europe. Une alternative à Visa et Mastercard qui sert déjà 130 millions d'utilisateurs.

item.title: Five AI agent predictions for 2026: The year enterprises stop waiting and start winning
item.description: 2026 is the year of operationalizing AI. Here are five predictions for how AI agents will reshape business in 2026.

item.title: MongoDB instances are being hit in data extortion attacks, so make sure you're protected
item.description: Hackers are hunting for vulnerable MongoDB servers and there are reportedly many to choose from.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is back on sale for $299
item.description: Whether you're one of the few people still keeping up with New Year's resolutions or just want an upgraded smartwatch, now is a good time to get an Apple Watch. Currently, the Apple Watch Series 11 is on sale for $299, down from $399. The 25 percent discount brings the 2025 model back down to its record-low price. We named the Apple Watch Series 11 as our choice for best smartwatch overall. It scored a 90 in our review thanks to its 24 hours-plus of battery life and a thin, light design that's easy to wear. It also offers new health metrics, including Apple's hypertension alerts system and Sle...

item.title: Trump is shutting down D.C.’s Kennedy Center for 2 years this summer. Here’s why
item.description: In the midst of cancellations from performers, Trump announced the venue would be closing in July. President Donald Trump said Sunday he will move to close Washington’s Kennedy Center performing arts center for two years starting in July for construction, his latest proposal to upturn the storied venue since returning to the White House.Trump’s announcement on social media follows a wave of cancellations by leading performers, musicians and groups since the president ousted the previous leadership and added his name to the building. Trump made no mention in his post of the recent cancellations...

item.title: Its never been cheaper to get the Soundcore Nebula X1 Pro — an all-in-one mobile cinema
item.description: The Soundcore Nebula X1 Pro home and outdoor cinema projector is on sale at Amazon for $4,299, down from the list price of $4,999. That's a 14% discount.

item.title: The Epstein files
item.description: The Department of Justice has released more of its records on self-described “science philanthropist” and convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. Other than Epstein, they’ve also brought an intense focus on the many powerful people who associated and corresponded with him, including Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Google cofounder Sergey Brin, and President Donald Trump. There’s also […]...

item.description: Alors que Samsung ne devrait pas présenter ses prochaines montres avant l'été prochain, les Galaxy Watch 9 et Galaxy Watch Ultra 2 ont déjà été certifiées par la GSMA.

item.description: Looking for a new gaming laptop? Newegg has just provided TechRadar readers a handy exclusive code to discount its RTX 5000 series machines even further this week.

item.title: Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85 hits Netflix on April 23
item.description: While the main series might be over, Netflix is far from done with Stranger Things. The first spin-off to hit the streaming service will be Stranger Things: Tales From ‘85. The company had said that the animated show would arrive sometime this year and now, alongside a new trailer, it confirmed a release date of April 23. The trailer is a bit of an odd watch given that Stranger Things wrapped up only a month ago. Going from that to this animated style with a whole new voice cast is jarring, but a fun gag at the end of the clip taps into certain misconceptions the audience might have.Stranger T...

item.title: Grindr beefs up safety features for 2026 Winter Olympics
item.description: Grindr is enhancing its safety features to keep athletes safe and private during the 2026 Winter Olympics.

item.title: Fin de l’IPTV sur Fire TV, Amazon bloque l’installation des APK
item.description: Amazon sonne la fin de la récréation pour les utilisateurs bidouilleurs de ses clés de streaming. Une mise à jour logicielle bloque désormais l'installation de certains fichiers APK, rendant le sideloading bien plus complexe sur les Fire TV.

item.title: Docusign’s CEO on the dangers of trusting AI to read, and write, your contracts
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Allan Thygesen, who is the CEO of Docusign. You know Docusign; it’s the platform where you sign things online. It turns out 7,000 people work there, which is one of those facts you see flying around sometimes that’s always felt like perfect Decoder bait. What are all those people doing? And […]

item.title: Dragon Quest gets another great remake that’s perfect for newcomers

In the case of Dragon Quest, there are nearly a dozen mainline titles, not to mention copious spinoffs and ports that span four decades of history. Of late, though, […]

item.description: Carbon Robotics' Large Plant Model will allow farmers to kill new types of weeds without having to retrain the machines.

item.title: Coalition demands federal Grok ban over nonconsensual sexual content
item.description: Nonprofits urge the U.S. government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after the xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images, raising national security and child safety concerns.

item.description: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined would be a perfect first-ever RPG, but is just as enjoyable if it's your 50th.

item.title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is a chill, condensed take on a fascinating game
item.description: The newest remake of 'Dragon Quest VII' is more digestible than ever, even if that means it's not a complete version of the game.

item.title: Honor Magic V5 : l’un des smartphones pliables les plus fins du monde est presque à moitié prix
item.description: Lancé l'an dernier, le Honor Magic V5 est un smartphone pliable au format « fold » qui n'a quasiment rien à envier au Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7. Il est surtout moins cher que son grand rival : pendant les soldes d'hiver, on le trouve à 1 189,99 euros au lieu de 1 999 euros chez Rakuten.

item.title: Windows 11 : Microsoft a mis six mois pour corriger ce bug de connexion problématique
item.description: Le bug qui masquait le bouton pour saisir le mot de passe de connexion à votre session Windows 11 est enfin résolu, six mois après sa découverte.
